name: Jira Carbon (Improved) - RTL
description:
Based on amazing Jira Carbon 2 theme
https://userstyles.org/styles/164736/jira-carbon-2

This is a hobby project maintained by me, this means:
1. I am very interested to improve it.
2. My time and resources are limited. I try my best to maintain it better.



Please Report Bugs Here:
https://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/78808/bug-report-here-please-click-see-more-and-comment-on-topic/



~~~ Changelog ~~~
v0.2.1
- fixed some bugs on backlog page
v0.2
- Added "Vazir" font as the main font - https://github.com/rastikerdar/vazir-font
- 

v0.1
- Added a couple of fixes and RTL support

discussions.name: I hope it gets better over time :)
Bug Report Here Please (Click See More and comment on topic)
